remarks: An orthocomplement is nonzero iff the double orthocomplement is not the whole vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochn0nv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochn0nv.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochn0nv.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochn0nv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochn0nv.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochn0nv.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochn0nv.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
dochn0nv $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` X ) =/= { .0. } <-> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) =/= V ) ) $.
